item.title: easydiffusion/easydiffusion
item.description: An easy 1-click way to create beautiful artwork on your PC using AI, with no tech knowledge. Provides a browser UI for generating images from text prompts and images. Just enter your text prompt, and see the generated image.

item.description: Mac app that shows all open files, directories, sockets, pipes and devices in use by all running processes. Nice GUI for lsof.
